page.title: 09Puppy Walking, Exford
page.content: Every year the Foxhounds give us a puppy about a month old. I have to take it for a walk on a lead every day.The huntsman brings us flesh for it to eat and we give it milk. It gets bigger and stronger all the time. It plays with our other sheepdogs,it can jump high and run as fast as me.It has to have injections and it has a number inside its ear.After we have it for about 8 months it goes back to the Kennels.When it is time for the puppy show,we go and see all the young hounds together.They are put in a shed and called out with their brothers and sisters.The judge sees which six hounds are the best.Last year ours was just out ,he was number seven.Perhaps this year ours will be the best of all.
